 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָמֹק‎</span>, [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 28</sup>] **verb** ==be deep== (Late Hebrew in derivatives; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> probably Assyrian [<abbr title="transliteration"><u>***emê‡u***</u></abbr>] III. 2 ***implore*** (earnestly; 'from ***bottom*** of one's soul'), <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***emû‡u***</u></abbr>, ***might***, <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nîme‡u***</u></abbr>, ***wisdom*** (? as unfathomable); [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] in derivatives; Syriac in derived species); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָֽמְקוּ‎</span> [[Ps.92.6|Ps 92:6]] (of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s designs; compare Assyrian above). **Hiph\`il** ***make deep: Perfect*** 3 masculine singular (symbolic) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעְמִיק הִרְחִ֑ב‎</span> [[Isa.30.33|Isa 30:33]] (that is Tophet; [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֱמִיק‎</span>, and so in following); 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעְמִיקוּ‎</span> [[Hos.5.2|Hos 5:2]] the pit of Shittim (?) ***have they made deep*** (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁחַת הַשִּׁטִּים‎</span> [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]], compare [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Gu|Gu]]<sup>Kau</sup>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעְמִיקוּ סָרָה‎</span> [[Isa.31.6|Isa 31:6]] (figurative) ***they have made deep (their) apostasy***; followed by verb, with adverbial force <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁחֵתֻ֖וּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ה‎</span> [[Hos.9.9|Hos 9:9]] = ***they are in the depth of corruption*** (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁחת‎</span>); ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעְמִיקוּ‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:63o»§ 63o</sup>), followed by infinitive [[Jer.49.8|Jer 49:8]]; [[Jer.49.30|Jer 49:30]] ***make deep to dwell*** (of hiding, so most; &gt; [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] ***take an abject seat***, as [[Jer.13.18|Jer 13:18]]; [[Jer.48.18|Jer 48:18]]); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמַּעֲמִיקִים לַסְתִּר‎</span> [[Isa.29.15|Isa 29:15]] ***they who deeply hide*** from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> (their) counsel; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַעְמֵק‎</span> [[Isa.7.11|Isa 7:11]] = Imperative ***make deep*** (ask a sign in the depths of <abbr title="transliteration"><u>Sh®°ôl</u></abbr>, reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁאֹ֑לָה‎</span>; opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַגְבֵּהַּ‎</span>).
